Goats have been taught to perform a great many wonderful exploits
The celebrated traveler Dr. Clarke gives a very curious account of a goat which he came across in Arabia
a goat he came across in Arabia
This goat would perform some most surprising feats of dexterity
We met
" " he says " an Arab with a goat
a goat he led about the country to exhibit in order to gain a livelihood
He had taught this animal
while he accompanied its movements with a song to mount upon little cylindrical blocks of wood resembling in shape the dice
placed successively one above another
belonging to a backgammon table
In this manner the goat stood first on the top of two
it remained
balanced upon the summit of them all
afterward of three four five six elevated several feet above the ground
four five six with its fore feet collected upon a single point throwing down the disjointed fabric
without throwing down the disjointed fabric on which it stood
of the upper cylinder , on which its four feet alternately remained until the Arab had ended his ditty ,
until the Arab had ended his ditty
The diameter of the upper cylinder , on which its four feet alternately remained until the Arab had ended his ditty , was only two
the length of each was six

repeat

the goat appeared uneasy
When the man suddenly stopped
in the middle of his song the animal fell to the ground "
A farmer in Scotland missed one of his goats
one of his goats when his flock came home at night
the missing animal would get among the young trees in his nursery
he sent two boys to watch all night
wrapped up warm in their plaid cloaks
In the morning these boys climbed up the brow of a hill near by to hunt for the wanderer
They found her after a long search
She was on the brow of a hill
her young kid was by her side
This faithful mother was defending the kid from the attack of a fox
The enemy was using all the cunning art
all the cunning art he was to get possession of the little fellow
while the old goat was presenting her horns in every direction
as he made his sallies
The boys shouted at the top of their voices in order to drive the fox away
But Master Renard was probably
that they would not dare to touch him
At any rate he kept up the assault
getting of patience with the goat
out
At last he made a more resolute effort to seize the kid
in an instant all three of the animals rolled off the precipice
all three of the animals were killed the fall
The fox was found at the bottom of the gorge the goat horns piercing his body
A story is told Mr. Bingley
Mr. Bingley illustrates in a very forcible manner the gratitude affection of the goat
a gentleman had taken a very active share in it

After the final suppression of the Scottish rebellion of 1715 by the decisive battle of Preston a gentleman escaped to the West Highlands to the residence of a female relative , who afforded him an asylum
the residence of a female relative afforded him an asylum
the strict search was made after the ringleaders
As in consequence of the strict search which was made after the ringleaders it was soon judged unsafe for him to remain in the house of his friend
he was conducted to a cavern in a sequestered situation
he furnished with a supply of food
The approach to this lonely abode consisted of a small aperture , through which he crept , dragging his provisions along with him
of a small aperture , through which he crept , dragging his provisions along with him
dragging his provisions with him
the roof became
A little way from the mouth of the cave the roof became elevated on advancing
on advancing an obstacle obstructed his progress
He soon perceived
whatever it might be
that the object was a living
unwilling to strike at a venture with his dirk he stooped down
he discovered a goat her kid
lying on the ground
The animal was evidently in great pain
feeling her body limbs
he ascertained
that one of her legs had been fractured
He bound it up with his garter she as if intimating
He offered her some of his bread
she refused to eat as if intimating
she stretched out her tongue
that her mouth was parched with thirst
He gave her water
her water she drank greedily
then she ate the bread
At midnight he ventured from the cave
he pulled a quantity of grass the tender branches of trees
he carried them to the poor sufferer , which received them with demonstrations of gratitude
the poor sufferer received them with demonstrations of gratitude
The only thing this fugitive had to arrest his attention in this dreary abode
The only thing was administering comfort to the goat
he was indeed to have any living creature beside him
She quickly recovered
She became tenderly attached to him
It happened
the servant was intrusted with the secret of his retreat
that the servant fell sick
when it became necessary to send another with provisions
happening to be lying near the mouth of the cavern
The goat on this occasion , happening to be lying near the mouth of the cavern opposed his entrance with all her might
butting him furiously
hearing a disturbance
went forward
receiving the watchword from his new attendant
the fugitive interposed
the faithful goat permitted him to pass
